data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Illizi, Algeria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Illizi, Algeria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Illizi, Algeria, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Illizi, Algeria.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Illizi.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Illizi.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Hausa people.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 26 believers living in the state of Illizi. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Illizi, Algeria to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Illizi, Algeria.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
